WOlfblade::

She smiled at him, taking his hand and walking with him. She was
feeling better now, knowing that he seemed to be free of some terrible
weight that was on his shoulders.  She turned to speak to him. Her
lips started to open, then she shut them and faced forward. After a
bit, keeping her face still forward, "Where are we headed?"  SInce she
wasn't given coordinants, she felt a little unsettled.  She had always
been one to take charge, now she felt uneasy knowing she would have to
trust him fully on completing their mission. Yet, strangely, the
unsettled feeling wasn't fear, just a new feeling she wasn't yet used
to. However, she felt it wouldn't take long to like it. 




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> Malice:  
>  
> He walked toward the coordinates given to him by Rodimus, quiet for
a bit, sorting his thoughts.  On one hand he had deeply hurt himself
and Blacknightmare, but on the other he could live freely with his
first true love, Wolfblade.  After a while he smiled, and paused in
his stride.  he held out his hand to Wolfblade, a smile so true and
reflecting how he felt.
>  
> Free, his spark no longer under the burden it was, free to love
Wolfblade and keep his promise to Blacknightmare and Hellplague.
>
